# timeZone

**Instance Property**

The time zone to use when formatting the date and time components.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeZone: TimeZone
```

## Modifying a Date Format Style

- **calendar**: The calendar to use when formatting the date.
- **capitalizationContext**: The capitalization context to use when formatting the date.
- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the date and time components.
